scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix frontend && npm run test --prefix backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend && npm run test:coverage --prefix backend
